roleset.name: show to be false
roleset.note: DISPROVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'disprove' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from disprove.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: And it would shift the burden to prosecutors-1 *trace*-1 to disprove that discrimination caused any statistical racial disparities.
example.arg: discrimination caused any statistical racial disparities
